name: Waiting For The Bathroom
description:
Waiting For The Bathroom is a game with a short and scary story, this game has 3 different endings, let's find all the endings! Game Story :

On a sunny night suddenly you have a stomach ache, you rush to the bathroom which is a bit far from your room, when you get there you realize it's like someone is in the bathroom...

What's next?, Play Now! it's a free game!, so what are you waiting for?

the download size is only 60MB and the quality graphics can be changed in the game settings! Download Now! Available For Windows Only!
